instructions:
Reve de Dragon character sheet. Nearly completely automated with a custom roll template. Roll buttons take in account global condition malus. Roll buttons require an attribute input and a difficulty. Difficulty is given by the GM or chosen by the player when attacking. Skills values are integrated in the macro. The roll template shows results ranges and the overall result. For global difficulties less than -8, you'll have to consider the table. Initiative is not automated, though.
